title: Drawing, "Design for Woven Textile with Menorah"
medium: Brush and gouache, silver paint, graphite on textured white paper
creditline: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
description: Roughly square field divided into uneven rectangles some with dense silver hatchings, some with less dense silver hatchings.  In right half of field, a large, seven-brached menorah with "Ysrael" in blue Hebrew characters beneath.  In left half of field "Yisrael" in blue Hebrew characters at upper left with a version of a menorah (up-side-down) beneath.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Woven Textile with Menorah".
Brush and gouache, silver paint, graphite on textured white paper. Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives. 1993-121-52.
